Job Title: Techninal Lead and Intermediate Project Manager
Contents: About CrossBorder Pickups: We are a small but growing company big BIG PLANS. A company that focuses on providing strategic logistics needs to small to medium size businesses, primarily in the ecommerce sector.We provide unique services to the small businesses that are usually only available to the big retailers/corporations. We help small companies and retailers compete with the shipping rates that large retailers have the luxury of and we do this by using technology, on ground assets and partnerships with other carriers.Services: Some of our services include· LTL imports and exports to and from the US/Canada· Section 321 exports to the US for Canadian ecommerce companies· Small package and parcel imports from the US to Canada· Ecommerce shipment to the US, focusing on strategic domestic injection points in the US, for businesses that are in Canada· FBA exports to the US and imports to Canada· Returns services from US consumers for Canadian ecommerce Companies· Domestic and international shipping for Canadian companies· Canadian fulfillment and shipping for US ecommerce companiesRole: We are looking for a technical person ready to begin their future in the project management world. This position will focus on· Maintaining and enhancing our database and customer portal and operational applications. We heavily use Quickbase for most of our operations· Develop detailed plans and accurate estimates for the design, build, implementation, and maintenance phases of the projects focused on the new enhancements to our customer portal and operational processes· Attract and retain a team of highly skilled IT professionals including senior and junior developers. Provide leadership and direction to direct reports in creating a collaborative working environment of high expectations and commitment with focus· Managing the application development projects working directly with offsite development team· Hands on with QA and Testing the applications before release and troubleshoot after launch· Provide digital support, issue resolution and guidance on existing solutions· Cleaning and optimizing the database for old/ unused data· Keeping inventory of all technology assetsNon Technical Abilities: · Since we have a unique mix of services with new to market capabilities and options, the candidate will be required to understand the market and advise on features and system enhancement opportunities· The candidate will need to identify trends and opportunities, understand ecommerce logistics and fulfillment needs and develop technology solutions accordingly· The candidate will need to obtain strong knowledge of the import and export requirements for international shipments and ecommerce needs· The candidate will deal with the Owner and CEO directly and advise of opportunities and growth strategiesLocation and Travel: · Flexibility to work from home partially· Position based on our Mississauga office (West Mississauga)· Regular travel between our existing 3 retail and office locations as well as future partner locationsRequirements: · Creative, smart, fast-learner and interest in ecommerce and shipping are key· 2-3+ years’ experience in developing and leading development of .NET dev stack/PHP/Web/mobile(angular/ SQL/Big-Data, including people leadership responsibilities.· 1-3+ years DevOps experience with continuous integration/delivery tools and technologies including GitHub and Jenkins· Experience with tools such as Jira, Confluence and Google Analytics· Experience with AWS and cloud technologies, AWS certification.· Experience and understanding of the ecommerce marketplace and platforms. Knowledge of import and export laws can also be very beneficial· University education in Computer Science or Project Management· Outstanding presentation skills, communication and rapport building capabilitiesCompensation: · Compensation will be offered based on experience and skill set and is expected to be above marketReference ID: CBP-TECHJob Type: Full-timePay: $60,000.00-$80,000.00 per yearBenefits:Dental careExtended health carePaid time offSchedule:8 hour shiftWork remotely:No
